page.title: 10BUILDING AT DENBIGH HIGH (2)
page.content: Previously the school was situated on two seperate sites{3/4ml.}apart.During the winter the children were at the{ {mercy }of the{weather}and the{traffic was also a{danger.}There have been many problems during the building programme.{Broken electricity mains {which cause faulty heating and closure {of the school for two days.}There were also problems of{noise,mud,dust and {restrictions of movement.}Access to parking space will not change because staff use space next to the gym and swimming pool which is hardly used during the day.The old grammer school which used to be part of the split site is now a{centre for the {Y.T.S.,a dancing school and day {classes for adults.}
